hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class Throwables

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.Throwables

  • public final class Throwables
extends Object
    Utility methods for handling exceptions and throwables.
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.11.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void throwAsUnchecked(Throwable t)
      Throws the given exception as unchecked by either casting it to RuntimeException or wrapping it into a RuntimeException, if not null.
      static void throwAsUncheckedWithCause(Throwable t, Throwable cause)
      Sets up the cause for the exception and throws it by either casting it to RuntimeException or wrapping it into a RuntimeException.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • throwAsUnchecked

        public static void throwAsUnchecked(@Nullable
                    Throwable t)
        Throws the given exception as unchecked by either casting it to RuntimeException or wrapping it into a RuntimeException, if not null.
        Parameters:
        t - the exception to throw as unchecked if not null

      • throwAsUncheckedWithCause

        public static void throwAsUncheckedWithCause(@Nullable
                             Throwable t,
                             @Nonnull
                             Throwable cause)
        Sets up the cause for the exception and throws it by either casting it to RuntimeException or wrapping it into a RuntimeException.
        Parameters:
        t - the exception to throw, null means no-op
        cause - the cause for the exception
